mutants.code:
def min_moves_to_sort(arr, n):
    inc = 1
    ans = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        arr[i] += inc
        if arr[i] >= arr[i - 1]:
            continue
        diff = arr[i - 1] - arr[i]
        ans += diff
        inc += diff
        arr[i] += diff
    return ans

        ans += diff

    return ans
